name: Manual Displacement Slide
description: Suitable for optical equipment, semiconductor manufacturing equipment, microscopes, photographic equipment, printing presses, etc.
The crossed roller type movement guide method has low rolling friction and stable performance.
The movement of one rotation is only 0.5mm, which can fine-tune the movement distance of the platform.
The sliding table is made of aluminum alloy, which is silent when working, scratch-resistant and friction-resistant.
The slide rail is controlled by the gear rotating handle, which has smoother operation and higher accuracy.
Warranty not applicable for this product

name: Variable Frequency Drive Converter
description: Super large all-aluminum base fan heater combined with imported powerful fan, super wind power, super fast heat dissipation.
Used in spindle motors, lathes, milling, pumps, treadmills, conveyors, winding machines, mixers, extruders, splitters, compressors, ventilators, elevators, centrifuges and other machines.
This frequency inverter has a humanized keyboard design, easy to operate and clear display.
With the common functions of current mainstream inverters, with comprehensive functions and suitable for many scenarios.
Made of industrial flame‑retardant ABS material, heat‑resistant, flame‑retardant, impact‑resistant and safe.
Warranty not applicable for this product

name: PX4 Flight Controller
description: Main FMU Processor: STM32F76 (32 bit M7, 216 MHz Processor running RTOS, more computing power and 2X the RAM than previous versions) Abundant connectivity options for additional peripherals (UART, I2C, CAN)
Redundant power supply inputs and automatic fail over External safety button for easy motor activation
New sensors with higher temperature stability Multicolor LED indicator
Integrated vibrations isolation micro card for long-time high-rate logging
16 PWM outputs Increased ease-of-use: pre-installed with most recent PX4 (v1.8)

name: Anti Zap Protector
description: The surge suppressor can protect the vehicle electrical systems to avoid damage from voltage spikes while starting welding or jumping.
Suitable for 12/24V systems. Polarity protected-reverse connection warning.
Designed for across battery terminals installation to absorb unnecessary power surges.
LED Lights: Green light on means protection on, red light on means protection off. In conditions of no protection, the warning alarm will sound too.
Please feel free to contact us if you have any questions, we will try our best to meet your satisfaction.
Warranty not applicable for this product

name: Windsurfing Mast Extension Stick
description: Universal for SDM standard mast.
Made of quality aluminium alloy material, with rod and base mount adapter, and has high strength 1.8m nylon rope, good performance.
Can be extanded 0-35cm, convenient and practical.
High strength, sturdy and durable, corrosion resistance, durable.
Wonderful accessory for windsurfing, sailboard and surfing water sports.
